product_name: The North Face Bishop Insulated Jacket - Women's
long_description: Influenced by streetwear, the women's Bishop insulated jacket by The North Face offers waterproof protection and insulated warmth for hucking in the pipe or slashing powder in the backcountry. Rugged HyVent(TM) 2-layer construction is waterproof, windproof and breathable; fully sealed seams prevent moisture from seeping through. Heatseeker(TM) polyester fiber insulation is strategically placed around your body to keep you warm without inhibiting movement. External chest pocket with access to media pocket; zip handwarmer pockets; wrist pocket with goggles cloth; internal goggles pocket. Stretch powder skirt with gripping elastic keeps snow out; snaps let you integrate the powder skirt with compatible pants by The North Face (sold separately). Cinch adjustable hem and rip-and-stick wrist cuffs help seal out cold air and retain valuable warmth; underarm zip vents let you control airflow and your comfort. Fully adjustable hood ensures a weather-blocking, personalized fit; hood can be secured to jacket so it doesn't flap around and cramp your style. Drawcord hem and rip-and-stick cuffs to help retain warmth. The North Face Baker Delux women's insulated jacket has a relaxed fit with a roomy body and sleeves.
short_description: Influenced by streetwear, the women's Bishop insulated jacket by The North Face offers waterproof protection and insulated warmth for hucking in the pipe or slashing powder in the backcountry.
